meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Vietnam.
meanings.sent1: In Vietnam, you can use tuans to buy delicious food.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for tuans when I visited Vietnam.
meanings.sent3: The shopkeeper only accepts tuans, not other currencies.
meanings.sent4: Tuans jingled in his pocket as he walked down the street.
meanings.sent5: She saved up all her tuans to buy a special gift.

meanings.definition: A group of people living in a village in Malaysia.
meanings.sent1: The tuans in the village gathered for a community meeting.
meanings.sent2: The tuans worked together to build a new bridge in the village.
meanings.sent3: The tuans celebrated a successful harvest with a feast.
meanings.sent4: The tuans welcomed newcomers with open arms.
meanings.sent5: The tuans shared stories and laughter around the fire.

meanings.sent1: She carefully tuans the key in the lock to open the door.
meanings.sent2: Please tuans the knob to adjust the volume.
meanings.sent3: He tuans the bottle cap but it won't open.
meanings.sent4: The dancer tuans gracefully on the stage.
meanings.sent5: The wind tuans the leaves on the trees gently.
